column1: Local Foods////I've never had a sandwich here that wasn't high quality
column3: and all around delicious. My favorites are the lox and crunchy chicken sandwiches
column4: but I also love the egg salad and my friends rave about the duck confit and banh mi
column5: so basically you can't go wrong no matter what you get. The sides are all heavenly - just like the sandwiches
column6: I've never had one I didn't love
column7: but my favorites are the kale and tabouleh salads. It's all pretty healthy and (hence the name) local
column8: which makes it even better. The people are always friendly and talkative when you order at the register
column9: so the service is also great.
